소속
한양대학교 에리카캠퍼스 공학대학 건설환경공학과 교수
학력
1980년도 한양대학교 토목공학과 공학사
1982년도 한양대학교 토목공학과 공학석사
1987년도 (미) Cornell University 수리∙해안 공학박사
수상
2015, 제25회 과학기술 우수논문상 수상
연구실적
J. Choi, J.T. Kirby, and S.B. Yoon, “Boussinesq modeling of longshore currents in the SandyDuck experiment under directional random wave conditions”, Coastal Engineering, Vol. 101, pp. 17-34, 2015. (SCI)
J. Choi, K.K. Kwon, and S.B. Yoon, “Tsunami Inundation Simulation of a Built-Up Area using Equivalent Resistance Coefficient”, Coastal Engineering Journal, Vol. 54,  No. 2, pp. 1250012-25, 2012. (SCIE)
J. Choi, J.I. Lee, and S.B. Yoon, “Surface Roller Modeling for Mean Longshore Current over a Barred Beach in a Random Wave Environment”, Journal of Coastal  Research, Vol. 28, No. 5, pp. 1100-1120, 2012. (SCI)
J. Choi, and S.B. Yoon, “A Three-dimensional Numerical Simulation of Wave and Current Evolving over a Submerged Shoal”, Coastal Engineering journal, Vol. 53, No. 2, pp. 63-85, 2011. (SCIE)
J. Choi, and S.B. Yoon, “Numerical Simulation of Nearshore Circulation on Field Topography under Random Wave Environment”, Coastal Engineering, Vol. 58, No. 5, pp. 395-408, 2011. (SCI)
J. Choi, and S.B. Yoon, “Numerical Simulations using Momentum Source Wave-Maker Applied to RANS Equation Model”, Coastal Engineering, Vol. 56, No. 10, pp. 1043-1060, 2009. (SCI)
J. Choi, C.H. Lim, J.I. Lee, and S.B. Yoon, “Evolution of Waves and Currents over a Submerged Laboratory Shoal”, Coastal Engineering, Vol. 56, No. 3, pp. 297-312, 2009. (SCI)
S.B. Yoon, C.H. Lim, and J. Choi, “A Dispersion-Corrected Finite Element Model for Simulation of Distant Tsunamis”, Coastal Engineering Journal, Vol. 50, No. 1, pp. 75-99, 2008. (SCIE)
S.B. Yoon, C.H. Lim, and J. Choi, “Dispersion-Correction Finite Difference Model for Simulation of Transoceanic Tsunamis”, Terrestrial Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences, Vol. 18, No. 1, 31-53, 2007. (SCI)
S.B. Yoon, C.H. Lim, and J. Choi, “Dispersion-Correction Finite Difference Model for Simulation of Transoceanic Tsunamis”, Terrestrial Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences, Vol. 18, No. 1, 31-53, 2007. (SCI)
